mapper.select: select no, i_name, content, cnt, tot, price, st_date, ed_date, img, categ, up_date from item where no = #{no}

select b.pno, b.ref_ino, i_name, img, content, b.cnt, price, st_date, ed_date, b.up_date from item i join book b on i.no = b.ref_ino where b.ref_id = #{ref_id} and st_date >= current_date order by b.up_date desc, b.pno desc

select b.pno, b.ref_ino, i_name, img, content, b.cnt, price, st_date, ed_date, b.up_date from item i join book b on i.no = b.ref_ino where b.ref_id = #{ref_id} and st_date < current_date order by b.up_date desc, i.no desc
select pno from book where ref_id = #{ref_id} and ref_ino = #{ref_ino} and up_date = #{up_date} and cnt = #{cnt}
mapper.insert: insert into book(ref_id, ref_ino, up_date, cnt) values(#{ref_id}, #{ref_ino}, current_date, #{cnt})
mapper.select: select count(*) from book where ref_id = #{ref_id}
